title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5603.8 - Game display
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5603.8 - Game display

State Regulations

No registrant shall offer a display or interface that
uses video or mechanized reels or symbols or any other depiction of gambling
games (e.g.: slots, poker, blackjack, craps or roulette). No registrant shall
use a contest result or results as the direct or indirect equivalent of a
results-generator for a game or activity that appears to contestants to be an
activity other than interactive fantasy sports. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5603.8

Adopted

New

York State Register October 18, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 42, eff. 10/18/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
